title: Activists stage protest at Weather Channel headquarters over geoengineering cover-up
cleaned_text:
A few years ago in 2015, Georgia congressional candidate Greg Pallen and a sizable group of truth-seekers and truth-tellers congregated in front of The Weather Channel headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia, to protest a phenomenon that’s been taking place for a number of years now, but that most people still don’t even know exists: chemtrails.

During an episode of InfoWars that aired back in 2015, and is still available for viewing at Brighteon.com, Pallen discussed how The Weather Channel is being used every single day as a propaganda tool to sell the type of fake news that keeps people in the dark about the reality of geoengineering.

“Geoengineering, I do believe … is the most important topic of our time,” Pallen stated plainly during the segment.

What is geoengineering, you might be asking? If you’ve followed any of our earlier work, you may already know that it has to do with those long, white trails of fake clouds that are emitted from airplanes on a regular basis.

These artificial clouds, we now know, are laced with harmful chemicals that, combined with other chemicals in our food and water, are highly toxic to the human body. And what’s worse is that everyday humans have no control over whether or not they breathe air that’s contaminated with these chemicals.

“I fight the fluoride issue as well, the GMO issue, the mercury in the vaccines issue,” says Pallen.

“We can control the water we drink, we control the food we eat, we can control if we take vaccines or not, but we cannot control the air that we breathe. And through tests of water, soil, snow, and air, we have found very, very high quantities of aluminum, barium, strontium, we found arsenic, mercury, lead, and this is nano-particulate form metals that bypass the blood-brain barrier.”

Be sure to watch the full InfoWars segment with Greg Pallen at Brighteon.com below:

Chemtrail chemicals are combining with fluoride in water to completely destroy people’s brains

With all that he already knows about fluoride, Pallen decided to investigate further the potential interactions between this known neurotoxin that’s deliberately added to many municipal water supplies, and the various chemicals that are emitted from airplanes as part of chemtrailing endeavors. And what he found is nothing short of shocking.

“When you combine aluminum with fluoride, you get a 10,000 percent increase in toxicity,” Pallen warns. “So the people who are drinking fluoridated water, and then breathing this nano-particulate aluminum, that alone should be a huge cause for concern … We have to get the spraying stopped.”

Besides renting out billboards, often on his own dime, and spreading the message wherever he goes, Pallen believes that another useful tool is to get out in front of the buildings where propaganda is being spread – in this case The Weather Channel, which is perhaps the nation’s most well-known purveyor of weather-related news.

“This is the belly of this beast,” says Pallen about The Weather Channel.

“This is the propaganda machine that helps sell the polar vortexes and the new types of cloud formations that are clearly not normal. I’ve watched the sky, they start spraying at approximately, a lot of days, 12 noon … and by late afternoon, it starts out as a criss-cross pattern, and if you watch those trails dissipate, it forms a milky haze. It goes from a perfectly blue sky to a totally hazed over white sky over a period of hours.”

The “GregPallen4Congress” Facebook page is still up and running if you’re interested in learning more about his agenda.

You can also read more geoengineering-related news at Geoengineering.news.
